input_email_body:
Subject: Reported Freeze Issue with SaaS Platform Hello Customer Support,
I am contacting you to report an unexpected freeze issue with the SaaS platform You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.. It might be related to an Azure integration problem My name is Elena Ivanova.. I have already attempted to restart my computer and verified the firewall settings, but the issue continues. I kindly request you to look into this and supply a solution as quickly as possible. Please inform me if you need any further details from me. Thank you for your help.
